fields.description: You can understand and use basic phrases, introduce yourself and describe in simple terms aspects of your background and environment
fields.name: Basic

fields.description: You can deal with most situations likely to arise while travelling in an area where the language is spoken and interact with a degree of fluency
fields.name: Independent

fields.description: You can express ideas fluently and spontaneously and can use the language flexibly for social, academic and professional purposes
fields.name: Proficient
